plot outline: In remote village four brothers Yogi, Nandu,Jinu and Balli are married to the same women Bhoomi and all have physical relationship with her she has a son Anshu but nobody knows who is his father among the four.Kshitee their their younger brother who lives in city arrives and as per family tradition even he has to marry Bhoomi but he declines as he is well educated and does not believe in such customs.Yogi the elder brother whose more spiritual and along with him everyone worships the idol of Gurruji and feel that by doing this Kshite is insulting the idol which could lead to something bad so Bhoomi tries to seduce Kishtee.
title: Panchali
plot: Apu and his poor family live in a village where they try to make ends meet. The father leaves for the city to try and earn more money while his daughter has fever.

In remote village four brothers Yogi, Nandu,Jinu and Balli are married to the same women Bhoomi and all have physical relationship with her she has a son Anshu but nobody knows who is his father among the four.Kshitee their their younger brother who lives in city arrives and as per family tradition even he has to marry Bhoomi but he declines as he is well educated and does not believe in such customs.Yogi the elder brother whose more spiritual and along with him everyone worships the idol of Gurruji and feel that by doing this Kshite is insulting the idol which could lead to something bad so Bhoomi tries to seduce Kishtee.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
